info.name: SEE DESC. - Simple Dark Tweaks for FR
info.description: This was an add-on for Simple Dark Theme for Flight Rising, but will no longer be maintained as I have remade the dark theme. Install the rewritten dark theme here, via Userstyles.World.
info.additionalInfo: This theme will no longer be updated going forward. I have completely rewritten the dark theme, and will no longer be maintaining bug fixes for Zoga's original style. The rewrite is available at this link. I will not be adding it to Userstyles.org anytime soon as creating and maintaining large styles on this site is a frankly atrocious experience. -------------- Original Description: SCREENSHOT ALBUM IS HERE. Install for Stylus via the USO Archive if you want to be able to customize the style directly in Stylus without visiting this page. This is a minor expansion/tweaks/bug fix for the Simple Dark theme for Flight Rising. This was mostly made for me, but has a few tweaks that others may find useful so I decided to upload it here. You MUST also have the Simple Dark Theme installed in order for this to work properly. -------------- Installation Notes: Just install via the USO Archive. It is 100% better because it uses UserCSS instead of dumping code directly into the style. It is not worth installing via this site and I can't guarantee everything will work as intended. The first dropdown may be bugged if you install directly via this site because it was a few years ago. I don't know anymore, because I can no longer install anything with this site. If you want scene compatibility, you will have to search the Dark Theme's Code for #dragon-profile-scene and either DELETE or COMMENT OUT both instances of the following code: screenshot. -------------- FULL LIST OF FIXES/CHANGES: Bug Fixes: • Lucky streak text is changed back to black. • Choosing a dragon vista background is now dark when no vista is selected. • The alert background is now blue on pages using the old layout. • Very long usernames in the forums will now wrap instead of overflowing into the post. • Fixed text color when changing clan location. • Various text and background color bug updates for latest additions to the site, as the Dark Theme has not been updated since 2020. General Changes: • Dark check boxes and dropdowns. • More obvious disabled buttons (lowered opacity). • Lowered brightness of the light gray separators (graydot.png). • Breeding ground dragon cards are now dark and the element backgrounds match the lair update. • Tomo Color Fixes. • Dark scry share widgets.*** • Dark dragon placeholder images for crossroads.** • Styles the following site additions/refactors that the main style is missing: - Dustcarve Dig - Arlo's Ancient Artifacts - World map & world map share widgets. - The Marketplace Refactor - Grand Exchange Shops - Clan Profiles/Activity/Friends List Optional Changes: • Customizable selection text color. Default is light purple text with a black bg. • Scenes compatibility • PM/Forum restyling - standardizes the messages/topics list styling and colors. Has minor QoL changes. • Remove Color Text in Forums - reverts the colors of any colored text in the forum EXCEPT for admin posts and transparent text (as transparent text is generally used only for formatting). • Larger buttons in Modals (when opening chests, bonding with familiars, applying genes, trading with swipp, etc.) • Hoard/Vault - Darker item backgrounds, including less intense colors for selected items & favorite items. • Lair/Nesting Grounds - Darker dragon card backgrounds with a light blue gender icon. • Softer black outline for bestiary text, and white text for owned awakened familiars for better contrast. * achieved using pseudoelements ** achieved with filter *** achieved with a combination of pseudoelements & filter -------------- Changelog: 2023 • Apr. 1 - Fixed Festive Favors image Mistral - Fixed bgs for Marva's & Sage's winter/spring shops - Toggle text style in forums being unreadable due to black text has been fixed. • Feb. 20 - Fixed Festive Favors image for Trickmurk - Fixed bgs for Higgins' & Susie's shops 2022 • Dec. 1 - Fixed Festive Favors image for Rockbreaker's • Sep. ?? - Fixed Festive Favors image for Starfall • Oct. 10 - - Removed bugged dropdown option. It's obnoxious and I want to see if the bug has been fixed. - Canned the FF fixes option. It's been almost 2 years since FF was updated to properly handle the image replacement code from the main style, I haven't touched the code in years, and I have no way to test or update this legacy code anyways. - Reworked forum and PM styling to be much less dramatic, but kept the changes optional jic. Font size is back to default. Looking into adding a separate option to enlarge the text for easier reading. - Added option to remove colored text in forum posts for readability. It is enabled by default. - Fixed poor contrast of blockquotes. - Adjusted some option labels and install keys - Added a few missed buttons to larger modal buttons option - Minor bug fixes for chromium-specific issues • Oct. 7 - - Fixed bug with draggable items (apparel, lair reorder, etc) going offscreen when using the "On Right + Center Content" Option of the Navigation options. - Added a few missed buttons to larger modal buttons option - Fixed gap between content and bottom banner ad • Oct. 5 - - Regexp bug fixes for nesting grounds & converted to regexp for some sections. will eventually switch completely over to regexp just to handle the inconsistent subdomain. - Added option to put navigation on the right side of the page instead of the left, default is unchanged. - Added option for sticky navigation that will stay on the screen as you scroll, default is enabled. - Added option to hide ad containers, default is enabled. - Styled settings page with grid so things are no longer going off the page and it will look more consistent overall. - Fixed a bug for 3+ column layouts caused by the clearing divs because I changed the content layout to use grid instead of float. - Squashed some minor bugs. • Oct. 3 - - Styled the updated clan profiles, clan activity page, and friends list pages. - Fixed missing flight bgs on hib den, lair, and nesting ground pages. Added Regexp to properly handle the inconsistent URL formatting of the nesting grounds. - Added optional experimental restyling of the forums and PMs • Sep. 25 - - Fixed Joxar BG for Starfall • Aug. 28 - - Fixed Joxar BG for Flameforger's - Fixed Arvelle BG - Minor color fixes - Added some missed buttons for larger button option • Jul. 25 - - Styled new Joxar shops - Various minor bug fixes • Jun. 23 - Minor bug fix for unreadable text in Arlo plots. • Jun. 22 - - Updated style for Arlo, new gathering interface, new Baldwin, and new Crim. - Various text and background color fixes. - Renamed FF fixes dropdown to include a note as the fixes were really only needed for older versions of the browser. content:url not working to replace images was fixed ~1 year ago (for the most part, it still has issues with dynamic image replacements). I'm leaving it in for now but will likely remove. - Sharing the news that I'll likely be forking/rewriting Zoga's original style as it's been almost 2 years without an update. It'll be easier for me to work with (as there are changes in this style that have to fight against the base style's use of !important), and will result in a more consistent experience for all of the new updates/refactors. Changelog: 2021 • Jul. 7 - Fixed background color of favorited items in game database. • Jun. 29 - Various Bug fixes including Tomo's speech bubble trail, the scatterscroll modal, and the final page of Dustcarve Dig. Also Darkened festive favors and gave Joxar a dark speech bubble. • Jun. 15 - Various fixes for larger modal buttons and FF images. Darkened Dustcarve Dig/Future Sitewide Efforts and the new Tomo page. • Apr. 28 - Added missed images to FF fixes and some missed buttons to larger buttons option. Also added fix for darker dragon cards on the breeding page. • Apr. 4 - Minor updates/bug fixes for larger modal buttons code. • Apr. 2 - Bug fix related to menus for adding slots to the lair/hibden with larger modal buttons option. Added fixes for disabled gathering buttons. Added a couple of missed images to the FF fixes. • Mar. 27/28 - Adding some things I missed to larger modal buttons and FF image fixes. Also fixed issue with clan location selection text color. -------------- Misc. Notes: Conflicting code will be removed or made optional if unnecessary due to updates to the main style. The bulk majority of my image-related fixes don't involve editing & replacing images with other image files because I'm too lazy to edit and rehost files; the Arlo fix is the one exception. These CSS-only fixes are mainly are the result of using CSS filters on existing Flight Rising images or finding work arounds for FireFox that utilize the image replacements present in the main style. I highly recommend my other style, Alt locked items, if you don't like how locked items in the hoard are semi-transparent and would prefer an icon.
